name: Hunger Co., Ltd.
description: Developer of merchant SaaS systems used in nail, eyelash, hairdressing and beauty industries. The company's products can be built with a dedicated reservation, membership and POS system, and integrates with user social media accounts, enabling users build fast access to live operations.
one_liner: Developer of merchant SaaS systems used in nail, eyelash, hairdressing and beauty industries. The company's products can be built with a dedicated reservation, membership and POS system, and integrates with user social media accounts, enabling users build fast access to live operations.
